channel.title: Sorcerer Balance
channel.description:
I'm really not sure how to win as this class because of the following:
Any game you spawn in, the inquisitor spawns in. You can't fake claim inquisitor because then the real inquisitor will just kill you. No one will _ever_ vote to hang the inquisitor. If you somehow convince everyone that you're the real inquisitor and get the actual one hanged, they just hang you the next day.
Your only chance of winning is hoping someone can bypass night immunity and kill the inquis. I like the idea behind both classes, but the balance seems way off. Inquisitor is godly but sorc is just a worse reaper.
